/* SA012010.selectListSA012010 */ SELECT A.SALEID , A.SALEDATE , A.SALERCD , A.BUYID , A.CONNAME , A.CONM2 , B.SALEAMT , B.AGENCYAMT , C.DEPOSITDATE , D.OWNERNAME , D.CITYCODE , fn_codename('03', D.CITYCODE, NULL) AS CITYNAME , D.BOROUGHCODE , (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = D.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = D.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME , D.ADDRESS , E.KNAME , E.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', E.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS BRANCHNAME , E.DEPTCODE , fn_codename('05', E.DEPTCODE, NULL) AS DEPTNAME , (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE DEPTCODE = E.DEPTCODE AND GRADE = '007' AND DUTY = '002' LIMIT 1) AS MNGRNAME FROM sa_salemst A INNER JOIN sa_saledtl B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb C ON A.SALEID = C.SALEID INNER JOIN mm_buymst D ON A.BUYID = D.BUYID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst E ON A.SALERCD = E.INSACODE WHERE A.SALEDATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, '%Y-%m-%D') AND STR_TO_DATE(#S_SALEDATE_TO#, '%Y-%m-%D') AND A.SALEGUBUN = '002' AND C.DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND C.DEPOSITYN = 'Y'
AND E.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND E.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND E.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
ORDER BY C.DEPOSITDATE ASC, D.OWNERNAME ASC, CITYNAME ASC, BOROUGHNAME ASC, ADDRESS ASC
